tagline: A simple script to manage ssh connections
name: Ssh-manager
body: ============================= SSH Manager ============================= A simple script to manage ssh connections ![screenshot](https://github.com/robinparisi/ssh-manager/raw/master/screenshot.png) ## Installation $ cd ~ $ wget --no-check-certificate https://raw.github.com/Fendtwick/ssh-manager/master/ssh-manager.sh $ chmod +x ssh-manager.sh $ ./ssh-manager.sh For more convenience, you can create an alias into your .bashrc, .zshrc, etc... For example : alias sshs="/Users/robin/ssh-manager.sh" ## Use cc [username] add :::[port] del export ### Authors and Contributors Original script by Errol Byrd Copyright (c) 2010, Errol Byrd Modified by Robin Parisi (@robinparisi)
